Posts.Content: I know that this is an old thread. My mom has been diagnosed with metastatic carcinoma breast that has reached to omentum. She had a recurrance in 1993. Now this diagnosis almost after 22 years. Just wanted to know if you can help me with your experience. Let me know. Thanks, Vineeta
Posts.Title: Any information on peritoneal breast cancer spread?
